title: The Isley Brothers - The Heat Is On (2015) [24-96 HD FLAC]
description:
A legendary 70s Funk Rock album perfectly remastered in 24bit Audio HD. The Heat Is On is the thirteenth studio album by American soul and funk group The Isley Brothers, released June 1975. It sold 500,000 copies in its first month of release and spent 40 weeks on the U.S. Billboard Pop Albums chart. It became the Isley Brothers' first number-one album in the United States.


The Isley Brothers - The Heat Is On
Label: Epic/Legacy 
Format: WEB, 7 files FLAC, Album, Reissue, Remastered, 24bit 96kHz HDtracks
Released: 2015
Originally released 1975
